events.name: RSA Conference 2025
events.description: Premier global cybersecurity conference with 43,500+ attendees, 650+ exhibitors, and 450+ sessions covering security strategy, threat intelligence, identity, cloud security, and AI.

events.name: AWS Financial Services Symposium 2025
events.description: Exclusive all-day event for senior business and IT executives across banking, payments, capital markets, and insurance. Invite-only, director level and above.

events.name: AWS Summit Washington DC 2025
events.location: Walter E. Washington Convention Center, Washington, DC
events.description: AWS's largest North American summit, tailored for public sector. 340+ sessions covering cloud migration, AI, security, and digital transformation for government, education, and nonprofit.

events.name: AWS Partner Summit Washington DC 2025
events.location: Walter E. Washington Convention Center, Washington, DC
events.description: Invite-only partner event preceding the DC Summit. Focused on co-sell strategy, partner enablement, and executive roundtables with AWS leadership.

events.name: AWS re:Inforce 2025
events.description: AWS's dedicated cloud security conference. Keynote by CISO Amy Herzog. Hands-on training, security-focused sessions on identity, compliance, threat detection, and privacy. Note: This is the final standalone re:Inforce — in 2026 it merges into re:Invent.

events.name: AWS Partner Summit New York 2025
events.location: Javits Convention Center, New York, NY
events.description: Invite-only partner event the day before AWS Summit NYC. Breakout sessions from sponsors, executive roundtables, and networking reception. Auto-registers attendees for Summit NYC.

events.name: AWS Summit New York 2025
events.location: Javits Convention Center, New York, NY
events.description: Free one-day summit with keynote by Swami Sivasubramanian (VP, AWS Agentic AI). 15,000+ attendees across enterprise, mid-market, and public sector.

events.name: Black Hat USA 2025
events.location: Mandalay Bay Convention Center, Las Vegas, NV
events.description: Premier information security conference. Four days of trainings followed by two-day main conference with 100+ briefings, Arsenal tool demos, and summits for executives.

events.name: AWS re:Invent 2025
events.location: Las Vegas, NV (multi-venue: Venetian, Mandalay Bay, MGM Grand, Caesars Forum, Wynn, Encore)
events.description: AWS's flagship annual conference. Five keynotes, hundreds of technical and leadership sessions, certification bootcamps, partner expo, and re:Play networking event. 14th annual event.

events.name: Best of re:Invent 2025 (Virtual)
events.description: Free virtual event featuring curated highlights, top sessions, and biggest announcements from re:Invent 2025. Available on-demand after live broadcast.

events.name: AWS PartnerEquip: Live — Bengaluru 2025
events.description: Three-day in-person enablement for AWS Specialization Partners. NDA product roadmaps, hands-on labs, executive briefings, and co-sell strategy sessions. Invite-only.

events.name: AWS PartnerEquip: Live — Seattle 2025
events.description: Three-day in-person enablement for AWS Specialization Partners. NDA product roadmaps, hands-on labs, executive briefings, and co-sell strategy sessions. Invite-only.

events.name: AWS PartnerEquip: Live — Washington DC 2025
events.description: Three-day in-person enablement for AWS Specialization Partners. NDA product roadmaps, hands-on labs, executive briefings, and co-sell strategy sessions. Invite-only.

events.name: AWS PartnerEquip: Live — London 2025
events.description: Three-day in-person enablement for AWS Specialization Partners. NDA product roadmaps, hands-on labs, executive briefings, and co-sell strategy sessions. Invite-only.

events.name: HIMSS26 Global Health Conference
events.host: Healthcare Information and Management Systems Society (HIMSS)
events.location: Venetian Expo & Convention Center, Las Vegas, NV
events.description: Premier healthcare IT conference with 25,000+ attendees from 88 countries. 600+ sessions, 950+ exhibitors covering health IT innovation, cybersecurity, AI, interoperability, and digital transformation.

events.name: RSA Conference 2026
events.description: Premier global cybersecurity conference. Theme: Power of Community. 600+ exhibitors, sessions on agentic AI, identity, cloud security, threat intelligence, and regulatory policy.

events.name: AWS Summit Paris 2026
events.location: Palais des Congres de Paris, Paris, France
events.description: Free one-day summit covering cloud migration, agentic AI, serverless computing, and customer showcases. Keynote, breakout sessions, partner expo, and networking reception.

events.name: Hannover Messe 2026
events.description: World's leading industrial trade fair with 4,000+ exhibitors and 120,000+ visitors. Covers automation, digitalization, energy, robotics, AI, cybersecurity for OT/ICS, and Industry 4.0.

events.name: AWS Summit London 2026
events.location: ExCeL London, Royal Victoria Dock, London, United Kingdom
events.description: Free one-day summit with keynote, breakout sessions, partner expo, and networking reception. Topics include agentic AI, serverless computing, cloud migration, and security.

events.name: AWS Summit Singapore 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for the Southeast Asia region covering cloud innovation, AI, and digital transformation.

events.name: AWS Summit Sydney 2026
events.description: Two-day AWS Summit for Australia and New Zealand. Cloud innovation, AI, data analytics, and partner solutions.

events.name: AWS Summit Hong Kong 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for the Greater China and Asia Pacific region.

events.name: HIMSS26 European Health Conference
events.host: Healthcare Information and Management Systems Society (HIMSS)
events.description: European edition of HIMSS conference. Digital health transformation, AI, interoperability, cybersecurity, and policy across European health ecosystems.

events.name: AWS Summit Hamburg 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for the DACH region covering cloud innovation, AI, and partner solutions.

events.name: AWS Summit Seoul 2026
events.description: Two-day AWS Summit for South Korea covering cloud innovation, AI, and digital transformation.

events.name: AWS Summit Mumbai 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for the India region covering cloud innovation, AI, and digital transformation.

events.name: AWS Summit Milan 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for Southern Europe covering cloud innovation, AI, and partner solutions.

events.name: Gartner Security & Risk Management Summit 2026 (US)
events.location: Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center, National Harbor, MD
events.description: Premier summit for CISOs and security leaders. Tracks on AI in cybersecurity, cyber resilience, cloud security, data security, and security leadership. Theme: Smarter, Faster, Stronger … Together.

events.name: AWS Summit Toronto 2026
events.location: Metro Toronto Convention Centre, Toronto, Canada
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for Canada covering cloud innovation, AI, and partner solutions.

events.name: AWS Summit Madrid 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for Iberia region covering cloud innovation, AI, and partner solutions.

events.name: AWS Summit Los Angeles 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for the West Coast US region covering cloud innovation, AI, security, and partner solutions.

events.name: AWS Summit New York 2026
events.location: Javits Convention Center, New York, NY
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for the East Coast US region. Expected 15,000+ attendees across enterprise, mid-market, and public sector.

events.name: AWS Summit Tokyo 2026
events.description: Two-day AWS Summit for Japan covering cloud innovation, AI, and digital transformation.

events.name: AWS Summit Washington DC 2026
events.location: Walter E. Washington Convention Center, Washington, DC
events.description: AWS's largest North American summit, tailored for public sector. Note: Shifted from June 10-11 (2025) to June 30 – July 1 (2026). 340+ sessions, partner expo.

events.name: AWS Summit Bogota 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for the Andean region of Latin America.

events.name: Black Hat USA 2026
events.location: Mandalay Bay Convention Center, Las Vegas, NV
events.description: Premier information security conference. Trainings Aug 1-4, Summits Aug 4, Briefings Aug 5-6. 100+ briefings, Arsenal demos, and executive summits.

events.name: AWS Summit Jakarta 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for Indonesia and Southeast Asia.

events.name: AWS Summit Mexico City 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for Mexico and Central America.

events.name: AWS Summit Zurich 2026
events.description: Free one-day AWS Summit for Switzerland and the Alpine region.

events.name: Gartner Security & Risk Management Summit 2026 (London)
events.description: European edition of Gartner's security summit for CISOs and security leaders. Focused on enterprise security strategy, vendor selection, and risk frameworks for EMEA.

events.name: AWS Summit Canberra 2026
events.description: AWS Summit focused on Australian public sector. Date TBD for 2026.

events.name: AWS re:Invent 2026
events.description: AWS flagship annual conference. Dates TBD but expected December 2026. Note: 2026 will incorporate re:Inforce security content — no standalone re:Inforce event in 2026.
